text:
Is there a built-in way to update the status of a long running function and print to the repl without reprinting the whole thing? I.e. instead of reprinting

"Completed x of X iterations"; only update the "x" part?

elements.text:
Is there a built-in way to update the status of a long running function and print to the repl without reprinting the whole thing? I.e. instead of reprinting

"Completed x of X iterations"; only update the "x" part?

text:
```julia> function main()
           for i=1:10
               sleep(0.5)
               print("\r")
               print("$i in 10")
           end
       end```

elements.text:
julia> function main()
           for i=1:10
               sleep(0.5)
               print("\r")
               print("$i in 10")
           end
       end

text: You might also be interested in the ProgressMeter.jl package: <https://github.com/timholy/ProgressMeter.jl>

well, I copied this idea from ProgressMeter but since they asked explicitly:

text: <@UH8A351DJ> Thanks! It will be very nice to not have stuff flying across my REPL

elements.text: Thanks! It will be very nice to not have stuff flying across my REPL

text: You can always use the loggers / print to a file and then `tail -f myfile.txt` so that you stream the updates.

elements.text: You can always use the loggers / print to a file and then
so that you stream the updates.

text:
<@U6QGE7S86> ProgressMeer:
```p = Progress(100, color=:blue, barglyphs=BarGlyphs("[=$(Char(0x1F30A)) ]")); for i=1:100; next!(p); sleep(1); end```

elements.text: p = Progress(100, color=:blue, barglyphs=BarGlyphs("[=$(Char(0x1F30A)) ]")); for i=1:100; next!(p); sleep(1); end

text:
```for i in 1:100
    sleep(0.5)
    Str = "Done $i of 100"
    if i != 1
        Len = length("Done $(i-1) of 100")
        print(String(fill('\b', Len)))
    end
    print(Str)
end```

elements.text:
for i in 1:100
    sleep(0.5)
    Str = "Done $i of 100"
    if i != 1
        Len = length("Done $(i-1) of 100")
        print(String(fill('\b', Len)))
    end
    print(Str)
end
